meanings.definition: The lack or loss of appetite for food.
meanings.sent1: The child's anorexies worried his parents as he refused to eat his meals.
meanings.sent2: Her anorexies were evident when she left most of her dinner untouched.
meanings.sent3: The anorexies of the dog resulted in a playful game of trying to entice him to eat.
meanings.sent4: The anorexies of the city dwellers for healthy food options was a growing concern.
meanings.sent5: The anorexies of the student during exams showed the impact of stress on appetite.
